text: aur kitaabavaalon mein koee to aisa hai ki yadi tum usake paas dhan-daulach ka ek dher bhee amaanat rakh do to vah use tumhen lauta dega. aur unamen koee aisa hai ki yadi tum ek deenaar bhee usakee amaanat mein rakhon, to jab tak ki tum usake sir par savaar na ho, vah use tumhen ada nahin karega. yah isalie ki ve kahate hai, "un logon ke vishay mein jo kitaabavaale nahin hain hamaaree koee pakad nahin." aur ve jaanate-boojhate allaah par jhooth madhate hai
